mapper.update: update food_shop set food_id = #{foodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, food_num = #{foodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, food_price = #{foodPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, food_sales = #{foodSales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, food_ev = #{foodEv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_pic = #{foodPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_des = #{foodDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where food_shop_id = #{foodShopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select food_shop_id, food_id, shop_id, food_num, food_price, food_sales, food_ev, food_pic, food_des from food_shop where food_shop_id = #{foodShopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
